overview: Nanda (Hemachandran) is thrown out of his home by his drunkard dad. While working as a muscleman for his friend, he meets Nanditha (Meghna) and falls in love. Nanda agrees to kill Knockout Chandran (Shanmugaraja), a political candidate, for Devaraj (Nasser), the local big shot.
title: Nanda Nanditha
